title: 21i00 - General provisions.
text:
(a)   Effective 5/1/74, Sec 13(b)(27) of the Act provides an
exemption from the OT provisions for “any employee employed by an establishment
which is a motion picture theater”. (b)  There are no monetary tests under Sec 13(b)(27) nor is
it necessary in order for the exemption to apply that the establishment be a
“retail or service” establishment as defined in Sec 13(a)(2). The exemption may
thus apply without regard to whether or not the establishment is itself a
covered Sec 3(s) enterprise, or is a part of one.
html:
(a)   Effective 5/1/74, Sec 13(b)(27) of the Act provides an exemption from the OT provisions for “any employee employed by an establishment which is a motion picture theater”.

 

(b)  There are no monetary tests under Sec 13(b)(27) nor is it necessary in order for the exemption to apply that the establishment be a “retail or service” establishment as defined in Sec 13(a)(2). The exemption may thus apply without regard to whether or not the establishment is itself a covered Sec 3(s) enterprise, or is a part of one.
